Notes.Text:
This update for curl fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-5436: Fixed a heap buffer overflow exists in tftp_receive_packet that receives data from a TFTP server (bsc#1135170).

Vulnerabilities.Description: A heap buffer overflow in the TFTP receiving code allows for DoS or arbitrary code execution in libcurl versions 7.19.4 through 7.64.1.
